page.title: 11Sports Clubs-Castle Kennedy
page.content: {EYNHALLOW FOOTBALL CLUB. } This has been going for about seven years.It was started by boys from the village so they could play football in the Sunday League.So far they have been League champions three times. The club has been financed through sponsored walks,fetes and prize draws. Some of the money is used to give elderly people from the village a night out once a year. {THE BOWLING CLUB.} The new club house,in Castle Kennedy Gardens,was opened by Lady Stair in April,1982. The club has about thirty members and plays once a week.You do not pay to watch but yoy must pay to play.You must also wear flat shoes or you will spoil the bowling green. After the game you can buy tea and biscuits.
